languages.text: {n}Замешкавшись лишь на мгновение, словно для того, чтобы проверить, что ей все это не привиделось, Арджента бросается к сержанту и снимает его с обломков судна. Зажимая его раны руками, она оборачивается к вам и шепчет:{/n} "Спасибо, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Замешкавшись лишь на мгновение, словно для того, чтобы проверить, что ей все это не привиделось, Арджента бросается к сержанту и снимает его с обломков судна. Зажимая его раны руками, она оборачивается к вам и шепчет:{/n} "Спасибо, {name}".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta hesitates for a split second, as if to confirm that she is not imagining what she is seeing, then rushes over to the sergeant and lifts him out of the wreckage. She applies pressure to his wounds before turning her head to you and whispering,{/n} "Thank you, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Замешкавшись лишь на мгновение, словно для того, чтобы проверить, что ей все это не привиделось, Арджента бросается к сержанту и снимает его с обломков судна. Зажимая его раны руками, она оборачивается к вам и шепчет:{/n} "Спасибо, {name}".

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta hesitates for a split second, as if to confirm that she is not imagining what she is seeing, then rushes over to the sergeant and lifts him out of the wreckage. She applies pressure to his wounds before turning her head to you and whispering,{/n} "Thank you, {name}."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta hesitates for a split second, as if to confirm that she is not imagining what she is seeing, then rushes over to the sergeant and lifts him out of the wreckage. She applies pressure to his wounds before turning her head to you and whispering,{/n} "Thank you, {name}."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sidérée par la scène, Argenta hésite une seconde avant de se ruer au secours du sergent et de le dégager des débris. Elle tente de compresser ses plaies avant de se retourner vers vous et de vous murmurer : {/n}« Merci, {name} ».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta hesitates for a split second, as if to confirm that she is not imagining what she is seeing, then rushes over to the sergeant and lifts him out of the wreckage. She applies pressure to his wounds before turning her head to you and whispering,{/n} "Thank you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sidérée par la scène, Argenta hésite une seconde avant de se ruer au secours du sergent et de le dégager des débris. Elle tente de compresser ses plaies avant de se retourner vers vous et de vous murmurer : {/n}« Merci, {name} ».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔犹豫片刻，似乎想确定眼前的景象并不是幻觉。随后，她冲到军士身边，将他从残骸中扶了起来。她按住了军士身上的伤口，之后将头转向你，以耳语般的声音开了口。{/n}“谢谢你，{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta hesitates for a split second, as if to confirm that she is not imagining what she is seeing, then rushes over to the sergeant and lifts him out of the wreckage. She applies pressure to his wounds before turning her head to you and whispering,{/n} "Thank you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔犹豫片刻，似乎想确定眼前的景象并不是幻觉。随后，她冲到军士身边，将他从残骸中扶了起来。她按住了军士身上的伤口，之后将头转向你，以耳语般的声音开了口。{/n}“谢谢你，{name}。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは目の前の光景が錯覚ではないことを確かめるかのように一瞬ためらったが、すぐに駆け寄り、残骸の中から軍曹を抱き上げた。彼の傷口を押さえてから、彼女はあなたに顔を向けてささやいた。{/n}「ありがとう」{name}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta hesitates for a split second, as if to confirm that she is not imagining what she is seeing, then rushes over to the sergeant and lifts him out of the wreckage. She applies pressure to his wounds before turning her head to you and whispering,{/n} "Thank you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは目の前の光景が錯覚ではないことを確かめるかのように一瞬ためらったが、すぐに駆け寄り、残骸の中から軍曹を抱き上げた。彼の傷口を押さえてから、彼女はあなたに顔を向けてささやいた。{/n}「ありがとう」{name}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Für einen Sekundenbruchteil zögert Argenta, als wüsste sie nicht, ob sie sich nicht nur einbildet, was sie sieht, aber dann eilt sie zum Unteroffizier und hievt ihn aus dem Wrack. Sie drückt auf die Wunden, bevor sie dir den Kopf zudreht und flüstert:{/n} "Danke, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta hesitates for a split second, as if to confirm that she is not imagining what she is seeing, then rushes over to the sergeant and lifts him out of the wreckage. She applies pressure to his wounds before turning her head to you and whispering,{/n} "Thank you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Für einen Sekundenbruchteil zögert Argenta, als wüsste sie nicht, ob sie sich nicht nur einbildet, was sie sieht, aber dann eilt sie zum Unteroffizier und hievt ihn aus dem Wrack. Sie drückt auf die Wunden, bevor sie dir den Kopf zudreht und flüstert:{/n} "Danke, {name}."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta titubea un instante, como para confirmar que no se está imaginando lo que ven sus ojos, y luego corre hacia el sargento y lo saca de los restos de la aeronave. Presiona sus heridas antes de volver la cabeza hacia ti y murmurar,{/n} «Gracias, {name}».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta hesitates for a split second, as if to confirm that she is not imagining what she is seeing, then rushes over to the sergeant and lifts him out of the wreckage. She applies pressure to his wounds before turning her head to you and whispering,{/n} "Thank you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta titubea un instante, como para confirmar que no se está imaginando lo que ven sus ojos, y luego corre hacia el sargento y lo saca de los restos de la aeronave. Presiona sus heridas antes de volver la cabeza hacia ti y murmurar,{/n} «Gracias, {name}».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta bir anlığına tereddüt ediyor. Hayal görmediğini doğrulamaya çalışıyor gibi görünüyor. Hemen ardından çavuşa koşup onu enkazdan kaldırıyor. Argenta, Vigastes'in yaralarına baskı uygularken kafasını sana çevirip fısıldıyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta hesitates for a split second, as if to confirm that she is not imagining what she is seeing, then rushes over to the sergeant and lifts him out of the wreckage. She applies pressure to his wounds before turning her head to you and whispering,{/n} "Thank you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta bir anlığına tereddüt ediyor. Hayal görmediğini doğrulamaya çalışıyor gibi görünüyor. Hemen ardından çavuşa koşup onu enkazdan kaldırıyor. Argenta, Vigastes'in yaralarına baskı uygularken kafasını sana çevirip fısıldıyor:{/n} "Teşekkür ederim {name}."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
